name: Voidventures
description:
This is my first game as a gamedev student and I'll be updating this a while.

There's something familiar with the passenger of your spaceship...
Help him to navigate through dangerous asteroid area and try to collect as much evil Starpower as possible and beat your previous hi-score!

This is one button game, just give ship a boost with spacebar and fly past the asteroids!

Please give me any feedback you can and it shall help me with my gamedev jorney.

Thank you and take care!

-Mikko
